movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Framed for murder, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison and gradually forms a close bond with older inmate Red.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.synopsis: When an organized-crime family patriarch barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son steps in to take care of the would-be killers.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.synopsis: This second film in the trilogy explores the Corleone family roots, tracing Don Vito's journey from Sicily to a life of organized crime in New York.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: As Batman, Lt. Gordon and the district attorney continue to dismantle Gotham's criminal underground, a new villain threatens to undo their good work.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.synopsis: Oskar Schindler becomes an unlikely humanitarian, spending his entire fortune to help save 1,100 Jews from Auschwitz during World War II.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.synopsis: Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor.

movies.title: Fiction.
movies.synopsis: When a sheltered young woman becomes enamored with a struggling writer, she goes to great lengths to become involved in his creative process.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: Quentin Tarantino's stylized crime caper weaves together stories featuring a burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner and a washed-up boxer.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.synopsis: From the idyllic shire of the Hobbits to the smoking chasms of Mordor, Frodo Baggins embarks on his epic quest to destroy the ring of Sauron.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.synopsis: An insomniac corporate drone meets roguish rebel Tyler Durden, and together they form a cathartic but brutal underground society.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: Forrest Gump, a friendly, simpleminded man, finds himself in the middle of nearly every major event of the 1960s and '70s.

movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: In this mindbending sci-fi thriller, a man runs an espionage business built around entering the subconscious of his targets to steal their thoughts.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.synopsis: Frodo and Sam head to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns that what most people perceive as reality is actually a simulation created by machines and joins a rebellion to break free.

movies.title: GoodFellas
movies.synopsis: This gripping gangster opus follows real-world mobster Henry Hill, who dreamed of making it big but landed in the Witness Protection Program instead.

movies.title: Seven
movies.synopsis: A seasoned homicide detective and his new partner are on a desperate hunt for a killer whose gruesome crimes are based on the Seven Deadly Sins.

movies.title: Life Is Beautiful
movies.synopsis: A Jewish waiter, his wife and their son are sent to a concentration camp, where the waiter tries to protect his son's innocence by playing a game.

movies.title: God's Little Village
movies.synopsis: After 20 years, a man returns to his quiet, idyllic hometown in search of a wife only to find the community torn by a heated mayoral election.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.synopsis: Eight U.S. Army Rangers penetrate German-held territory during World War II to find and bring home a soldier whose three brothers have been killed.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.synopsis: When a prison guard discovers that a death row inmate possesses mysterious powers, he tries desperately to prevent the condemned man's execution.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.synopsis: Chihiro wanders into a magical world where a witch rules -- and those who disobey her are turned into animals.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: With humanity teetering on the brink of extinction, a group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of another inhabitable planet.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: One by one, the crafty members of a destitute family insinuate themselves into the household staff of a wealthy couple living in oblivious privilege.

movies.title: Leon: The Professional
movies.synopsis: Léon, a hit man in New York, becomes the unwilling custodian of Mathilda, a vengeful 12-year-old whose family was wiped out by a crooked DEA agent.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.synopsis: When five unacquainted crooks are hauled into a police station to appear in a criminal lineup, they decide to pull off a heist together.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.synopsis: Famed Polish pianist Wladyslaw Szpilman struggles to survive the onslaught of Nazi tyranny during World War II in this drama based on his memoirs.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.synopsis: Eccentric inventor Doc Brown turns a DeLorean into a time machine that inadvertently sends his young friend, Marty McFly, 30 years into the past.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.synopsis: A reprogrammed Terminator arrives from the future to protect young John Connor from a relentless shape-shifting cyborg in this sequel to Terminator.

movies.title: Modern Times
movies.synopsis: Conceived and produced as talking pictures were taking Hollywood by storm, Charlie Chaplin's satire of the machine age was also his last 'silent.'

movies.title: Psycho
movies.synopsis: When a larcenous real estate clerk goes on the lam with a wad of cash and hopes of starting a new life, she ends up at the notorious Bates Motel.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.synopsis: Tapped for the throne after the death of the emperor, a Roman general instead finds himself condemned to die by the late ruler's power-hungry son.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.synopsis: To take down Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own men to infiltrate it, not realizing the syndicate has done the same thing.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.synopsis: Based on a true story, a quadriplegic aristocrat's world is turned upside down when he hires a good-humored ex-con as his caretaker.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.synopsis: Driven by his demanding music teacher, drummer Andrew is determined to succeed as a jazz musician -- even if it destroys his personality.

movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies
movies.synopsis: Two orphans fight for survival in post-World War II Japan, but society is harsh and they struggle to escape the hardships of war and find enough food.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.synopsis: Desperate to reveal each other's secrets, two rival magicians begin to perform increasingly risky tricks -- which soon turn deadly.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.synopsis: When a Sicilian boy is mesmerized by the movies at his local theater, he befriends a projectionist who tells him to leave home and pursue his dreams.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now Redux
movies.synopsis: The reedit of this Vietnam War epic that follows an Army captain's search for a renegade colonel features new footage and a fade-to-black ending.

movies.title: Memento
movies.synopsis: Suffering short-term memory loss after a head injury, Leonard Shelby embarks on a grim quest to find the lowlife who murdered his wife.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.synopsis: When Tomania's anti-Semitic ruler cracks down on the Jews, a case of mistaken identity gives an amnesiac barber the chance to plea for democracy.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.synopsis: When Indiana Jones is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.synopsis: Accompanied by a German bounty hunter, a freed slave named Django travels across America to free his wife from a sadistic plantation owner.

movies.title: The Lives of Others
movies.synopsis: As a secret police agent eavesdrops on a successful writer in East Germany in 1984, he becomes increasingly fascinated by the man's life and politics.

movies.title: Joker
movies.synopsis: In 1981 Gotham City, a struggling, mentally ill comic battles to be seen. His life takes a dark, gut-wrenching turn after he lashes back at attackers.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.synopsis: Jack Torrance descends into madness -- terrorizing his wife and young son -- after living at a deserted and eerie hotel during its off season.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.synopsis: With no clue how he came to be imprisoned, drugged and tortured for 15 years, a desperate businessman seeks revenge on his captors.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.synopsis: A prince infected with a lethal curse sets off to find a cure and lands in the middle of a battle between a mining town and the animals of the forest.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.synopsis: After being bitten by a radioactive spider, Brooklyn teen Miles Morales gets a crash course in web-slinging from his alternate-dimension counterparts.

movies.title: Dr. Strangelove
movies.synopsis: When a fanatical U.S. general launches an air strike against the Soviets, they raise the stakes by threatening to unleash a 'doomsday device.'

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.synopsis: Billionaire Bruce Wayne must once again don the cape of his alter ego, Batman, when Gotham is threatened by new foes such as Catwoman and Bane.
